biotools.summary: A web server that allows a fine-grained structural classification of proteins using the T-RMSD method (Tree based on Root Mean Square Deviation). Providing a set of proteins sequences, it produces a structural tree with support values for each cluster node, reminiscent to bootstrap values. These values, associated with the tree topology, allow a quantitative estimate of structural distances between proteins or group of proteins defined by the tree topology.

bioschemas.name: T-RMSD
bioschemas.summary: A web server that allows a fine-grained structural classification of proteins using the T-RMSD method (Tree based on Root Mean Square Deviation). Providing a set of proteins sequences, it produces a structural tree with support values for each cluster node, reminiscent to bootstrap values. These values, associated with the tree topology, allow a quantitative estimate of structural distances between proteins or group of proteins defined by the tree topology.
